member.name: T:Penguin.Cms.Modules.Security.Attributes.RequireSecurityAttribute
member.summary: Requires a valid DI security token to access the controller action

member.name: M:Penguin.Cms.Modules.Security.Attributes.RequireSecurityAttribute.OnActionExecuting(Microsoft.AspNetCore.Mvc.Filters.ActionExecutingContext)
member.summary: Executes the action filter against the provided filter context
member.param: The filter context to execture against
